base_description: Gray rectangular box, medium size, minimalist design.
part_description: Composed of six flat rectangular panels forming a cube shape, with a small protruding section at the bottom front.
internal_interaction_description: The panels are joined at edges forming a hollow cube, with the bottom panel supporting the structure. The protruding section may provide additional stability or functionality, possibly acting as a base or support.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces, interacting with gravity to remain stable. It may serve as a container or support for other items, depending on its material and strength. Its minimalist design allows it to blend with various environments.
